name: PIVX
description: PIVX describes itself as 'a pioneer in Proof of Stake (PoS) technology and an MIT licensed, open-source, decentralized blockchain-based cryptocurrency focused on achieving fungibility, transaction privacy, community governance, network scalability, and real-world utilization. It aims to become one of the most technically advanced globally-accepted online digital currencies.  The team is currently working on a new Privacy Protocol.
